name: Cosmic Trip
description: Built exclusively for VR, Cosmic Trip is an award-winning real-time strategy game for the HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Windows MR headsets. Experience what itâ€™s like to build and command an army of badass robots while fighting against hostile enemies on strange alien planets.
